mean_cn: n. （日，月）食；  v. 掩盖……的重要性；使暗淡
mean_en: an occasion when the sun looks like it is completely or partially covered with a dark circle because the moon is between the sun and the Earth
word_etyma: ec出+lipse离开 →  日或月食；黯然失色
sentence: A solar eclipse occurs when the moon blocks the sun.
sentence_trans: 当月亮遮盖了太阳，就会发生日食。
